purpose: Renders a styled add button that triggers a callback with a configurable label and optional CSS class
Renders a collapsible category section with an icon, a toggle-all control, and a grid of items via a render prop
Lets users select multiple values as removable chips from a searchable dropdown list
Renders a collapsible in-page section that displays chronicle generation seed data for use in validation UIs
Displays chronicle generation seed data in a modal overlay that closes on backdrop or button click
Renders an empty-state placeholder with an optional icon, title, description, and action slot when no content is available
Renders a styled boolean toggle switch with an optional label that calls a callback with the new enabled state
Displays a capped set of era name badges with a count overflow indicator for any extras that exceed the visible limit
Renders a card with a clickable header that expands or collapses body content, supporting optional subtitle, actions, and a stable toggle ID
Wraps a form control with an optional label, hint text, and optional full-width layout for consistent form field presentation
Groups multiple form fields side-by-side in a horizontal layout row
Renders a small icon-only button with optional danger styling and a tooltip title attribute
Renders a styled informational callout box with an optional title and arbitrary child content
Renders a single list row with a name, optional muted styling, arbitrary child controls, and an optional remove button
Renders a set of colored level buttons that let users pick a categorical or numeric value, with an optional direct numeric input
Provides a textarea that buffers edits locally while focused and only propagates the value to the parent on blur to avoid excessive re-renders
Provides a reusable modal container with a header, optional sidebar tabs with badges, optional sidebar footer, and a close action
Renders a numeric input that parses and validates the entered value before calling onChange, supporting min, max, step, integer-only, and empty-allowed modes
Lets users add, remove, and adjust numeric delta values for a set of world pressures from a controlled key-value map
Renders a dropdown for selecting a single reference value from a list of options, with an optional searchable popover mode
Renders a popover dropdown with an optional search input that filters items by name and calls a callback when one is selected
Renders a section heading with an optional icon, count badge, description, and right-aligned action slot
Displays a count of validation errors as a styled badge, rendering nothing when the count is zero
Displays a 'Not in any era' badge when an item is orphaned, rendering nothing otherwise
Shows a compact numeric validation issue count badge inside a tab label, rendering nothing when the count is zero
Renders a progress bar that tracks processed versus total items in a bulk operation and changes color on failure or cancellation
Renders a status-colored terminal message block displayed when a bulk operation reaches its final state
Renders the list of items that failed during a bulk operation, showing each item's label and error message
Displays the dollar cost incurred by a bulk AI operation, rendering nothing when the cost is zero or absent
Loads and displays the cover image for a chronicle by ID, showing loading and error states and optionally making the image clickable
Renders the full cover image panel for a chronicle, including current status, scene generation, and image generation action buttons
Renders the set of active floating notification pills from the floating pill store, positioned as an overlay on the page
Displays a one-line summary of the current image generation settings (style, composition, palette) with a swatch, used in entity browser and chronicle image panels
Renders a compact sidebar button showing the active artistic style, palette swatch, and color to open the image settings drawer
Shows a modal viewer for a selected AI task's streamed thinking and response text, with tabs, auto-scroll, and auto-tab-switch when thinking finishes
Orchestrates the full lore backport workflow for a simulation run, combining single-chronicle and bulk-backport operations with entity context assembly and store refresh
Runs lore backport patches across all eligible chronicles in sequence, tracking per-chronicle progress and supporting cancellation
Processes historian review and edition tasks across a batch of entities in sequence, tracking progress and supporting cancellation
Provides callbacks for generating, regenerating, and summarizing chronicles by enqueuing enrichment worker tasks with the required generation context
Manages a single chronicle lore backport run, dispatching entity context patches to the enrichment worker and polling IndexedDB for completion
Watches the enrichment queue for completed chronicle and historian tasks and triggers store refreshes or notifications when they finish
Handles syncing world simulation data into a saved slot by validating preconditions and performing either an overwrite or patch sync operation
Manages the world dynamics LLM generation flow, building the full world context payload, launching generation, and merging accepted dynamics into the world context store
Manages a single LLM dynamics generation run by dispatching a worker task and polling IndexedDB until the proposed dynamics are ready or the run fails
Maintains a multi-worker enrichment task queue that distributes AI enrichment jobs across browser workers, handles reconnection, retries, and reports completion via a callback
Provides async CRUD callbacks for entity fields (description, summary, aliases, backrefs, image) that write to the entity repository and reload affected entities
Manages an LLM era narrative generation run by dispatching a sentinel enrichment task and polling IndexedDB until the narrative record is written or the run fails
Runs a two-phase fact coverage scan across chronicles, checking each canon fact against chronicle content and reporting which facts are covered, missing, or contradicted
Exposes historian edition and review action handlers, including a compression preview gate before starting an edition run
Wires together historian edition and review hooks, registers their starters globally, and provides callbacks for accepting, toggling, and cancelling historian runs
Manages a historian chronology LLM run by dispatching a sentinel enrichment task and polling IndexedDB until the chronology is ready or the run fails
Manages a single historian edition run that rewrites an entity description by dispatching a worker task and polling IndexedDB for proposed patches
Manages a single historian review run that generates editorial notes for an entity by dispatching a worker task and polling IndexedDB for the resulting notes
Bootstraps the Illuminator panel by assembling image settings, world schema, simulation metadata, enrichment queue, and all AI flow sub-hooks into a unified return object
